title: user registration endpoint validation
description: Test the /auth/register POST endpoint to ensure successful user registration with valid username, password, and email, and proper handling of invalid inputs or duplicate users.

title: user login authentication
description: Verify the /auth/login POST endpoint for successful user login with correct credentials and proper rejection with invalid credentials.

title: fetch user transactions with filters
description: Test the /transactions GET endpoint to retrieve user transactions filtered by userId, date range, category, and type, ensuring correct data is returned.

title: create new financial transaction
description: Validate the /transactions POST endpoint for creating a new transaction with all required fields, including recurring expense flag and payment method, and proper error handling for invalid data.

title: update existing transaction
description: Test the /transactions/{id} PUT endpoint to update an existing transaction by id, verifying successful update and handling of non-existent transaction ids.

title: delete transaction by id
description: Verify the /transactions/{id} DELETE endpoint to delete a transaction by id, ensuring successful deletion and proper response when transaction is not found.

title: get supported currencies list
description: Test the /currencies GET endpoint to retrieve the list of supported currencies and verify the response format and completeness.

title: currency conversion functionality
description: Validate the /currencies/convert POST endpoint for converting amounts between currencies, ensuring correct conversion results and error handling for invalid currency codes.

title: retrieve user settings
description: Test the /settings GET endpoint to fetch user settings by userId, verifying correct retrieval of preferences including theme, locale, and biometric enablement.

title: update user settings preferences
description: Verify the /settings PUT endpoint to update user settings such as default currency, locale, theme, and biometric enablement, ensuring successful update and validation of input data.
